programme.title: The Jack Bull
programme.desc: A Wyoming horse trader (John Cusack) clashes with a rancher (L.Q. Jones) who abused his horses and their Indian caretaker.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.sub-title: The Return of Don Pedro O'Sullivan
programme.desc: The Ranger impersonates two men to help a Mexican patriot cross the border.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Lone Ranger and Tonto search for $10,000 in missing gold.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: A teacher helps the Lone Ranger and Tonto stop the Cheyenne from destroying a small Western town.

programme.title: Dakota
programme.desc: A woman and her daughter find warmth and companionship when her late husband's combat dog comes to live on their farm. However, they must soon band together when a corrupt sheriff does whatever it takes to get his hands on the family's land.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteader's wife and her son back to safety after her husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, he stays on to help and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Brothers are at odds when an outlaw gang robs an express office.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A shooting occurs when an outlaw gang tries to kidnap the governor.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A young miner is kidnapped when it's learned that he's stumbled upon a bonanza.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A tyrannical Boston financier travels to Mineral City to confront his son.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: A gang tries to kill a dying murder-witness' sister.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: A man suspected of murdering a businessman suffers from amnesia.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: A black sombrero is the vital clue to a murder case.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: A killer hides from Hoppy in a friendly Mexican town.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: Thugs try to stop a group of Chinese immigrants from settling in the territory.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: To silence witnesses against their boss, outlaws kidnap McGivern's wife, Martha.

programme.title: The Train Robbers
programme.desc: A proud widow hires a Civil War veteran to help recover the gold her late husband stole from Wells Fargo.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: Jack is shot by a renegade, and Dion tries desperately to get a doctor to help him.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: The Vigilantes are helped by a boy in their struggle to capture the vicious Regulators.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: Martin Donovan plays a deadly game of politics.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: The vigilantes try to handle the problem of juvenile delinquency in San Francisco.

programme.title: The Undefeated
programme.desc: A Union colonel (John Wayne) with a herd of cattle crosses paths with an ex-Confederate colonel's (Rock Hudson) gang in Mexico.

programme.title: Yancy Derringer
programme.desc: Mei Ling gets arrested for opium smuggling after ordering firecrackers from San Francisco.

programme.title: Yancy Derringer
programme.desc: In Virgina City to check on his silver mine, Yancy finds a gravestone with his name on it.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill is serving as Marshall of Rio Nada, an area plagued by Mexican bandits who cross the border to raid the countryside; he captures one of the bandits and threatens him with hanging to get the identity of the bandit leader.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill is forced to kill one of the Dawson brothers after the man draws on him during a fight; now he must contend with the three other brothers who want revenge.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: After Bill turns down a bribe from a landowner to detour the track through his town, the man forces a doctor to quarantine the railroad workers with false claims.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill finds an old prospector almost dead from thirst and brings him to the railroad workers' camp; men from a rival outfit talk the old man into spreading a story about finding gold, hoping to lure workers away from their jobs.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: A group of convicts take over the work train and hold the entire construction crew hostage; Bill, who the convicts believe is dead, makes it back to the site and tries to stop them.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Bill is planning to leave the railroad worker camp and move on, but a former crewman shows up to make trouble; Bill learns the man is working as field agent for the company that the workers hoped to get a new contract from.

programme.title: The Cheyenne Social Club
programme.desc: Two cowboys (James Stewart, Henry Fonda) ride from Texas to Wyoming to claim an inheritance which turns out to be a brothel.
